issue.title: [C++] Put hashing function into src/arrow/util
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2220>

We should decide what our default go-to hash function should be (maybe murmur3?) and put it into src/arrow/util

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2803?focusedCommentId=16696232) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Marking this as resolved with https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/eaf8d32e5f292dca0aa5b5508041d5d39406224d. See arrow/util/hash-util.h. xxhash is now moved to arrow/util
